languages.text: "Домин'{name}. Священн{mf|ый|ая} цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега, мо{mf|й|я} защитни{mf|к|ца} и {mf|друг|подруга}". {n}Кибелла стоит, уверенно расправив плечи. Темные глаза сияют ярче звезд.{/n} "Чем Висирь Кровавой паутины, твоя тень, твой щит, твой клинок, может служить тебе?"

traits.locale_text: "Эним'{name}. Священн{mf|ый|ая} цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега, мо{mf|й|я} защитни{mf|к|ца} и {mf|друг|подруга}". {n}Кибелла стоит, уверенно расправив плечи. Темные глаза сияют ярче звездного неба.{/n} "Чем Висирь Кровавой паутины, твоя тень, твой щит, твой клинок, может помочь тебе?"

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"
languages.original_text: "Домин'{name}. Священн{mf|ый|ая} цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега, мо{mf|й|я} защитни{mf|к|ца} и {mf|друг|подруга}". {n}Кибелла стоит, уверенно расправив плечи. Темные глаза сияют ярче звезд.{/n} "Чем Висирь Кровавой паутины, твоя тень, твой щит, твой клинок, может служить тебе?"

traits.locale_text: "Enim'{name}. Sacred {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders squared confidently. Her dark eyes burn brighter than the stars.{/n} "How can the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

"Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

"Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

"Domin'{name}, Sacred {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

"Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

"Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

"Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

languages.text: « Domin'{name}, {mf|seigneur sacré|seigneure sacrée} de l'Arche, {mf|mon protecteur|ma protectrice} et {mf|ami|amie}. »{n}Les épaules redressées, ses yeux sombres plus étincelants que les étoiles, Kibellah exsude la confiance.{/n} « Comment le vizir de la Toile de Sang, votre bouclier, votre ombre et votre lame, peut vous servir ? »
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

traits.locale_text: « Domin'{name}, {mf|seigneur sacré|seigneure sacrée} de l'Arche, {mf|mon protecteur|ma protectrice} et {mf|ami|amie}. »{n}Les épaules redressées, ses yeux sombres plus étincelants que les étoiles, Kibellah exsude la confiance.{/n} « Comment le vizir de la Toile de Sang, votre bouclier, votre ombre et votre lame, peut vous servir ? »

languages.text: «Domin'{name}, sagrad{mf|o señor supremo|a señora suprema} del Arca, mi protector{mf||a} y amig{mf|o|a}». {n}Kibellah se yergue bien recta y su mirada arde con más luz que las estrellas.{/n} «¿En qué puede servirle la Visir de la Red Sanguinolenta, su escudo, sombra y espada?».
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

traits.locale_text: «Domin'{name}, sagrad{mf|o señor supremo|a señora suprema} del Arca, mi protector{mf||a} y amig{mf|o|a}». {n}Kibellah se yergue bien recta y su mirada arde con más luz que las estrellas.{/n} «¿En qué puede servirle la Visir de la Red Sanguinolenta, su escudo, sombra y espada?».

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}、聖なる箱舟のオーヴァーロード、我が守護者にして友よ」{n}キベラは堂々と胸を張って立ち、その黒い瞳を星よりギラギラと燃やしている。{/n}「あなたの盾であり、影であり、刃であるブラッドスパン・ウェブのヴィジールを、如何いたしますか？」
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・{name}、聖なる箱舟のオーヴァーロード、我が守護者にして友よ」{n}キベラは堂々と胸を張って立ち、その黒い瞳を星よりギラギラと燃やしている。{/n}「あなたの盾であり、影であり、刃であるブラッドスパン・ウェブのヴィジールを、如何いたしますか？」

languages.text: “秘者{name}，神圣的方舟之主，我的守护者，我的朋友。”{n}绮贝菈站在原地，充满自信地挺直了身子，黑色的双眼燃烧着比恒星更加明亮的火光。{/n}“织血罗网的宿老，你的坚盾、影子、利刃，该如何为你效劳呢？”
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}，神圣的方舟之主，我的守护者，我的朋友。”{n}绮贝菈站在原地，充满自信地挺直了身子，黑色的双眼燃烧着比恒星更加明亮的火光。{/n}“织血罗网的宿老，你的坚盾、影子、利刃，该如何为你效劳呢？”

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|heiliger Lord|heilige Lady} der Arche, {mf|mein Beschützer und Freund|meine Beschützerin und Freundin}." {n}Kibellah steht selbstbewusst mit aufrechten Schultern da, und ihre dunklen Augen leuchten heller als die Sterne.{/n} "Wie kann der Wesir des Blutgesponnenen Netzes, Euer Schild, Schatten und Eure Klinge, Euch dienen?"
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|heiliger Lord|heilige Lady} der Arche, {mf|mein Beschützer und Freund|meine Beschützerin und Freundin}." {n}Kibellah steht selbstbewusst mit aufrechten Schultern da, und ihre dunklen Augen leuchten heller als die Sterne.{/n} "Wie kann der Wesir des Blutgesponnenen Netzes, Euer Schild, Schatten und Eure Klinge, Euch dienen?"

languages.original_text: "Domin', sacred {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"

languages.text: "Arkın kutsal efendisi, koruyucum ve dostum Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah, öz güvenle omuzlarını dikleştirerek duruyor. Kara gözleri, yıldızlardan bile daha parlak.{/n} "Kanipi Ağı'nın Veziri; kalkanın, gölgen ve kılıcın sana nasıl yardımcı olabilir?"
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, sacred overlord of the Ark, my protector and friend." {n}Kibellah stands with her shoulders confidently squared, her dark eyes burning brighter than the stars.{/n} "How may the Vizsier of the Bloodspun Web, your shield, shadow, and blade, serve you?"
